Source.Name: libav
Source.Summary: Libav is a complete, cross-platform solution to decode, encode, record, convert and stream audio and video.
Source.Description: Libav is a friendly and community-driven effort to provide its users with a set of portable, functional and high-performance libraries for dealing with multimedia formats of all sorts.
